name: ARhythmic Rise
description:
A game about platforming your way to a high score by using the beat to your advantage.

---

How to Play DON'T FALL OFF THE SCREEN

Obviously, that defeats the purpose of the game. Ok, maybe it's not exactly obvious, but now it is!

Score Some Points

There are two ways to score points.

1) Break some bricks, you bad ass!

2) Pass through a red square... yes, they're just plain old red  square. They only appear for a few beats, then reappear somewhere else a few beats later. Be Fast!

Movement

At your disposal, you have three abilities that can help you move about.

1) Jump... I know, I know! you would never have expected that! Well, I pulled out all the stops for this one! Have at it!

2) Dash... Kinda like jumping, but you build up a little strength and, upon releasing the Dash button you almost teleport in the direction you're pointing. If you're not pointing in a direction, you're not going to go anywhere. If you hit a brick while doing a Dash, you'll do some damage to the brick... maybe even break it?

3) Wall Grab... While in the air, if you move against a wall, you'll grab it. You're a bit sticky ( hmmm... -_- ) so you'll need to jump again to get off.

---

This game was made by Bryan Miller ( ObsidianBlk ) for the Godot Wild Jam #47
